name: Ratikanta Behera
content: Dr. Ratikanta Behera - Assistant Professor, IISc Bangalore Professor Photo Dr. Ratikanta Behera Assistant Professor Department of Computational and Data Sciences Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore, India E-mail: ratikanta@iisc.ac.in Research Interests Scientific Machine Learning Integration of physics-based models with machine learning techniques, including Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) for solving differential equations and discovering governing laws from data. Wavelet-based machine learning techniques for solving PDEs. Recent publications: Wavelet-based PINNs, Fractional machine intelligence frameworks Tensor Computations and Applications Advanced algorithms for multiway data analysis, tensor decompositions (CP, Tucker, M-QR), generalized inverses of tensors, and efficient computational methods for high-dimensional data. 40+ publications on tensor inverses, M-QDR decomposition, t-product based methods Artificial Neural Networks Adaptive recurrent neural networks for solving time-varying equations, zeroing neural networks (ZNN), and finite-time neural networks for computational mathematics applications. Focus on varying-parameter RNNs, robust noise-tolerant networks Numerical Linear Algebra High-performance algorithms for large-scale matrix computations, iterative methods for linear systems, eigenvalue problems, and parallel computational techniques. Specialization in theory and computation of generalized inverses, matrix decomposition methods Wavelets in Scientific Computing Adaptive wavelet algorithms for PDEs, fractional differential equations, integral equations, and multiresolution analysis. Applications in signal processing and option pricing. Multilevel adaptive methods, spherical wavelets, time-fractional PDEs Quantum Computing Quantum algorithms for numerical linear algebra problems, quantum-based machine learning techniques for solving PDEs. Emerging research area with focus on quantum tensor networks Research Experience Assistant Professor May 2022 to today Department of Computational and Data Sciences Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore, India Postdoctoral Researcher December 2019 to May 2022 Department of Mathematics University of Central Florida, Orlando, USA Assistant Professor July 2016 to December 2019 Department of Mathematics and Statistics IISER Kolkata, India Postdoctoral Research January 2015 to July 2016 Laboratoire Jean Kuntzmann (LJK) Joseph Fourier University, Grenoble, France Postdoctoral Researcher December 2013 to December 2014 Department of Aerospace and Mechanical Engineering University of Notre Dame, South Bend, USA Ph.D. Mathematics October 2013 Department of Mathematics Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delhi, New Delhi, India Other Profiles Google Scholar ResearchGate Scopus ORCID Research Statistics 45+ Journal Publications 4+ Preprints 1 Book/Monograph 16+ Years Experience
